title: Ineos Grenadiers Backs Carlos Rodríguez for Unified GC Tour de France Push
content:
'Carlos will be leading the Ineos Grenadiers’ charge' : Pidcock, Bernal, and Thomas to back Spain's Rodríguez to corral forces to try to take on the 'Big 4.'

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Backs Carlos Rodríguez for Unified GC Tour de France Push on Velo.
author: ahood
